languages.text: パスカルがプラズマおよびメルタウェポンで{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離{/g}攻撃すると{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|e6fe1cf5410642be85f0ea27ef38c801}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}が{uip|DodgeReduction|e6fe1cf5410642be85f0ea27ef38c801}%上昇する。

languages.text: Pasqal, plazma ve melta silahlarıyla yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılarda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliğine +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|e6fe1cf5410642be85f0ea27ef38c801} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerine +%{uip|DodgeReduction|e6fe1cf5410642be85f0ea27ef38c801} kazanır.
